sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnservereqpmninfo ( server_eqpmn_id , server_eqpmn_nm , server_eqpmn_ip , server_eqpmn_mngr , mngr_email_adres , opersysm_info , cpu_info , mory_info , hddisk , etc_info , rgsde , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #serverEqpmnId# , #serverEqpmnNm# , #serverEqpmnIp# , #serverEqpmnMngr# , #mngrEmailAdres# , #opersysmInfo# , #cpuInfo# , #moryInfo# , #hddisk# , #etcInfo# , #rgsde# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE() )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnservereqpmninfo SET server_eqpmn_id = #serverEqpmnId# , server_eqpmn_nm = #serverEqpmnNm# , server_eqpmn_ip = #serverEqpmnIp# , server_eqpmn_mngr = #serverEqpmnMngr# , mngr_email_adres = #mngrEmailAdres# , opersysm_info = #opersysmInfo# , cpu_info = #cpuInfo# , mory_info = #moryInfo# , hddisk = #hddisk# , etc_info = #etcInfo# , rgsde = #rgsde# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE() WHERE 1 = 1 AND server_eqpmn_id = #serverEqpmnId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnservereqpmninfo WHERE 1 = 1 AND server_eqpmn_id = #serverEqpmnId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT server_eqpmn_id , server_eqpmn_nm , server_eqpmn_ip , server_eqpmn_mngr , mngr_email_adres , opersysm_info , cpu_info , mory_info , hddisk , etc_info , rgsde , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtnservereqpmninfo WHERE server_eqpmn_id = #serverEqpmnId#

SELECT server_eqpmn_id , server_eqpmn_nm , server_eqpmn_ip , server_eqpmn_mngr , mngr_email_adres , opersysm_info , cpu_info , mory_info , hddisk , etc_info , rgsde , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM comtnservereqpmninfo WHERE 1=1
server_eqpmn_id = #searchKeyword#
server_eqpmn_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY server_eqpmn_id DESC limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnservereqpmninfo WHERE 1=1
server_eqpmn_id = #searchKeyword#
server_eqpmn_nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%')
